title: The reluctant and the envious: Therapeutic subalternity and
author: Ijaz; Nadine
description: This work presents a neo-Gramscian theorization of therapeutic hegemony and subalternity, deployed with reference to the practice of homeopathy in North America by two increasingly-professionalized bu
cleaned_text: and the envious: Therapeutic subalternity and the practice of homeopathy in North America Download full text from publisher As the access to this document is restricted, you may want to [search](/cgi-bin/htsearch?q=%22The+reluctant+and+the+envious++Therapeutic+subalternity+and+the+practice+of+homeopathy+in+North+America%22) for a different version of it.
